<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Didactic Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=1476) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 65 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Shared Stratagem](/Feats.aspx?ID=1454)

</column>

---

When you find a glaring weakness, you can set your allies up to annihilate your foe. When you use [Shared Stratagem](/Feats.aspx?ID=1454), you can designate up to 10 allies instead of just one. The foe is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against the first attack from each designated ally before your next turn, and each ally's first attack deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to the target if it hits.
name: Didactic Strike
